column1: This is just a formated text.@|You can use [b]bold[/b]|, [i]italic[/i]|, [b][i]bold and italic[/i][/b] or any bbcode style you want ||(even [color=red]c[/color][color=#ff7800]o[/color][color=yellow]l[/color][color=lime]o[/color][color=#00f1ff]r[/color][color=#c200ff]s[/color]!).@|Just be sure to set the fonts for other styles if you want to use them.
